    Wyrzykowski L., Pietrukowicz P., Kozlowski S., Poleski R., Ulaczyk K., 
    Rybicki K., Iwanek P. 
Table: Basic information about analyzed fields
================================================================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  6 A6     ---   field    OGLE-IV subfield name
   8- 15 F8.4   deg   RAdeg    Right ascension, decimal degrees (J2000)
  17- 24 F8.4   deg   DEdeg    Declination, decimal degrees (J2000)
  26- 32 F7.4   deg   GLON     Galactic longitude
  34- 41 F8.4   deg   GLAT     Galactic latitude
  43- 45 F3.1   10+6  Nstars   Number of stars, millions
  47- 51 I5     ---   Nepochs  Number of epochs
